title: Only for retail Brand’s
subtitle: We will never allow any partner which is not a brand. No non-verified partner will be allowed.

title: No outlet installation costs
subtitle: Brandlly will help you to grow your business all over the country without any outlet installation costs.

title: Pay when you sell
subtitle: Brandlly will receive a charge as commission based on sales amount. No commission required if no product is sold through Brandlly.

title: Customer Satisfaction
subtitle: No fraudulent discount. Customers will get the brand product with a fair price. Customer satisfaction is the ultimate goal for us.

title: Cashless, Secure Bank Payment
subtitle: Cashless, secure payment. Payment will be given weekly basis that means 4 payments in a month.

title: Mobile Monitoring
subtitle: Monitor all outlet’s sales from Brandlly Partners mobile application. Get real-time analysis of all the branches or outlet’s activities.

title: Performance Analysis
subtitle: You and your branch managers will get the analysis of every staff working with you. Brandlly will show impressive performance analysis data to you.

title: 24/7 Support
subtitle: We have a strong energetic support team ready 24/7 to serve you. You can call our support number or chat from mobile to get help.
